nodes.text: The Three Moons was a hotel in Mos Espa on Tatooine. Around 30 BBY, it was owned by a female inhabitant of Mos Espa named Rarta Dal. She hired only one employee, a steward named Kitster Chanchani Banai.
The Three Moons was mentioned twice in passing in Tatooine Ghost, a standalone novel written by Troy Denning and published by Del Rey.
